query: create table spgist_point_tbl(id int4, p point)
expected: CREATE TABLE spgist_point_tbl (id INT, p point)

query: create index spgist_point_idx on spgist_point_tbl using spgist(p) with (fillfactor = 75)
expected: CREATE INDEX spgist_point_idx ON spgist_point_tbl USING spgist ( p ) WITH (fillfactor = 75)

query: insert into spgist_point_tbl (id, p) select g, point(g*10, g*10) from generate_series(1, 10) g
expected: INSERT INTO spgist_point_tbl (id, p) SELECT g, point(g * 10, g * 10) FROM generate_series(1, 10) AS g

query: delete from spgist_point_tbl where id < 5
expected: DELETE FROM spgist_point_tbl WHERE id < 5

query: vacuum spgist_point_tbl
expected: VACUUM spgist_point_tbl

query: insert into spgist_point_tbl (id, p) select g,      point(g*10, g*10) from generate_series(1, 10000) g
expected: INSERT INTO spgist_point_tbl (id, p) SELECT g, point(g * 10, g * 10) FROM generate_series(1, 10000) AS g

query: insert into spgist_point_tbl (id, p) select g+100000, point(g*10+1, g*10+1) from generate_series(1, 10000) g
expected: INSERT INTO spgist_point_tbl (id, p) SELECT g + 100000, point(g * 10 + 1, g * 10 + 1) FROM generate_series(1, 10000) AS g

query: delete from spgist_point_tbl where id % 2 = 1
expected: DELETE FROM spgist_point_tbl WHERE id % 2 = 1

query: delete from spgist_point_tbl where id < 10000
expected: DELETE FROM spgist_point_tbl WHERE id < 10000

query: create table spgist_box_tbl(id serial, b box)
expected: CREATE TABLE spgist_box_tbl (id serial, b box)

query: insert into spgist_box_tbl(b) select box(point(i,j),point(i+s,j+s)) from generate_series(1,100,5) i, generate_series(1,100,5) j, generate_series(1,10) s
expected: INSERT INTO spgist_box_tbl (b) SELECT box(point(i, j), point(i + s, j + s)) FROM generate_series(1, 100, 5) AS i, generate_series(1, 100, 5) AS j, generate_series(1, 10) AS s

query: create index spgist_box_idx on spgist_box_tbl using spgist (b)
expected: CREATE INDEX spgist_box_idx ON spgist_box_tbl USING spgist ( b )

query: select count(*) from (values (point(5,5)),(point(8,8)),(point(12,12))) v(p) where exists(select * from spgist_box_tbl b where b.b && box(v.p,v.p))
expected: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (VALUES (point(5, 5)), (point(8, 8)), (point(12, 12))) AS v(p) WHERE EXISTS (SELECT * FROM spgist_box_tbl AS b WHERE b.b && box(v.p, v.p))

query: create table spgist_text_tbl(id int4, t text)
expected: CREATE TABLE spgist_text_tbl (id INT, t TEXT)

query: create index spgist_text_idx on spgist_text_tbl using spgist(t)
expected: CREATE INDEX spgist_text_idx ON spgist_text_tbl USING spgist ( t )

query: insert into spgist_text_tbl (id, t) select g, 'f' || repeat('o', 100) || g from generate_series(1, 10000) g union all select g, 'baaaaaaaaaaaaaar' || g from generate_series(1, 1000) g
expected: INSERT INTO spgist_text_tbl (id, t) SELECT g, 'f' || repeat('o', 100) || g FROM generate_series(1, 10000) AS g UNION ALL SELECT g, 'baaaaaaaaaaaaaar' || g FROM generate_series(1, 1000) AS g

query: insert into spgist_text_tbl (id, t) select -g, 'f' || repeat('o', 100-g) || 'surprise' from generate_series(1, 100) g
expected: INSERT INTO spgist_text_tbl (id, t) SELECT -g, 'f' || repeat('o', 100 - g) || 'surprise' FROM generate_series(1, 100) AS g

query: create index spgist_point_idx2 on spgist_point_tbl using spgist(p) with (fillfactor = 9)
expected: CREATE INDEX spgist_point_idx2 ON spgist_point_tbl USING spgist ( p ) WITH (fillfactor = 9)

query: create index spgist_point_idx2 on spgist_point_tbl using spgist(p) with (fillfactor = 101)
expected: CREATE INDEX spgist_point_idx2 ON spgist_point_tbl USING spgist ( p ) WITH (fillfactor = 101)

query: alter index spgist_point_idx set (fillfactor = 90)
expected: ALTER INDEX spgist_point_idx SET (fillfactor = 90)

query: reindex index spgist_point_idx
expected: REINDEX INDEX spgist_point_idx

query: create domain spgist_text as varchar
expected: CREATE DOMAIN spgist_text AS VARCHAR

query: create table spgist_domain_tbl (f1 spgist_text)
expected: CREATE TABLE spgist_domain_tbl (f1 spgist_text)

query: create index spgist_domain_idx on spgist_domain_tbl using spgist(f1)
expected: CREATE INDEX spgist_domain_idx ON spgist_domain_tbl USING spgist ( f1 )

query: insert into spgist_domain_tbl values('fee'), ('fi'), ('fo'), ('fum')
expected: INSERT INTO spgist_domain_tbl VALUES ('fee'), ('fi'), ('fo'), ('fum')

query: explain (costs off) select * from spgist_domain_tbl where f1 = 'fo'
expected: EXPLAIN (COSTS false) SELECT * FROM spgist_domain_tbl WHERE f1 = 'fo'

query: select * from spgist_domain_tbl where f1 = 'fo'
expected: SELECT * FROM spgist_domain_tbl WHERE f1 = 'fo'

query: create unlogged table spgist_unlogged_tbl(id serial, b box)
expected: CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE spgist_unlogged_tbl (id serial, b box)

query: create index spgist_unlogged_idx on spgist_unlogged_tbl using spgist (b)
expected: CREATE INDEX spgist_unlogged_idx ON spgist_unlogged_tbl USING spgist ( b )

query: insert into spgist_unlogged_tbl(b) select box(point(i,j)) from generate_series(1,100,5) i, generate_series(1,10,5) j
expected: INSERT INTO spgist_unlogged_tbl (b) SELECT box(point(i, j)) FROM generate_series(1, 100, 5) AS i, generate_series(1, 10, 5) AS j
